Parameters: AdvertisingSet: The advertising set that was started or null if error.
int: tx power that will be used for this set.
onAdvertisingSetStarted(android.bluetoot.Description: Callback triggered in response to @B_android#bluetooth#le#BluetoothLeAdvertiser#startAdvertisingSet_E@ indicating result of the operation. If status is ADVERTISE_SUCCESS, then advertisingSet contains the started set and it is advertising. If error occurred, advertisingSet is null, and status will be set to proper error code.
